description: This file defines a JPA entity class `BaggageBeltEntity` mapping to the `baggage_belts` database table, representing baggage belt information with fields such as id, beltCode, terminal, active status, createdAt, and updatedAt.

classes.name: BaggageBeltEntity
classes.description: JPA entity for the `baggage_belts` table, with fields for id, beltCode, terminal, active status, createdAt, and updatedAt, including getters and setters.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the UUID of the baggage belt

methods.name: getBeltCode
methods.description: Returns the belt code as a String

methods.name: getTerminal
methods.description: Returns the terminal identifier as a String

methods.name: isActive
methods.description: Returns whether the belt is active

methods.name: setId
methods.description: Sets the UUID for the baggage belt
